description: For those of you who have followed us for some time, you know that we are all about comfortable, chic and elegant clothes. When you go away on a ski trip, make sure you pack some comfortable pieces to wear after a day in the slopes. Or, if you are not going away, but are just longing to get into something more comfortable after work, we have made this line of fully fashioned knitwear that are made of SŸdwolle fine merino yarn that can be washed on wool setting in a washing machine. Practical and stylish! This elegant wide leg pants has a heavy, soft drape with a ribbed waistband. Wear it with the matching BERG sweaters.
name: Berg Pants - Womens
